forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 14C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 57F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 58F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
